<tr>
<td class="ub" style="width:99">
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Adjusted profit after tax</span></p>
</td>
<td class="ua" style="width:61">
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Profit after tax</span></p>
</td>
<td class="tz" style="width:307">
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Profit after tax, adjusting for exceptional and normalised items and the tax effect of those items, and the revenue haircut and associated tax effect. The tax on normalised items includes the benefit from tax deductible goodwill and intangibles.</span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Adjusted results allow for the comparison of results year-on-year without the potentially distorting effects of significant one-off items or items which do not relate to the underlying performance of the Group. </span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa">Adjusted profit after tax is used in determining cash conversion, a long-term target for the Group.</span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
</td>
<td class="ty" style="width:137">
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">See note 11 of the notes to the Interim Report.</span></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="uc" colspan="4" style="width:647">
<p class="avt"><span class="any"> Income statement - tax measures</span></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="ub" style="width:99">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">Effective tax rate</span></p>
</td>
<td class="ua" style="width:61">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">No direct equivalent</span></p>
</td>
<td class="tz" style="width:307">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">Tax expense for the year per the income statement expressed as a percentage of profit before tax.</span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
</td>
<td class="ty" style="width:137">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">See section b below.</span></p>
<p class="auz"><span class="any"> </span></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="ub" style="width:99">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">Effective tax rate before exceptional items</span></p>
</td>
<td class="ua" style="width:61">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">No direct equivalent</span></p>
</td>
<td class="tz" style="width:307">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">Tax expense for the year per the income statement adjusted for the tax effect of exceptional items, expressed as a percentage of profit before tax and exceptional items.</span></p>
<p class="auz"><span class="any"> </span></p>
<p class="auz"><span class="any">This provides an indication of the ongoing tax rate across the Group.</span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
</td>
<td class="ty" style="width:137">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">See section b below. The tax effect of exceptional items is provided in note 11 of the notes to the Interim Report.</span></p>
<p class="auz"><span class="any"> </span></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="ub" style="width:99">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">Effective tax rate on adjusted profit before tax</span></p>
</td>
<td class="ua" style="width:61">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">No direct equivalent</span></p>
</td>
<td class="tz" style="width:307">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">Tax expense for the year per the income statement adjusted for the tax effect of exceptional and normalised items, expressed as a percentage of profit before tax, exceptional and normalised items. The tax on normalised items includes the benefit from tax deductible goodwill and intangibles.</span></p>
<p class="auz"><span class="any"> </span></p>
<p class="auz"><span class="any">This provides an indication of the ongoing tax rate across the Group.</span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
</td>
<td class="ty" style="width:137">
<p class="auz"><span class="any">See section b below. The tax effects of exceptional and normalised items are provided in note 11 of the notes to the Interim Report.</span></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="uc" colspan="4" style="width:647">
<p class="avt"><span class="any">Income statement presentations</span></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td class="ub" style="width:99">
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Pro forma</span></p>
</td>
<td class="ua" style="width:61">
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Group GAAP results</span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
</td>
<td class="tz" style="width:307">
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Pro forma financial information does not represent the enlarged Group's actual results and does not purport to represent what the combined results would have been.</span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Pro forma results are presented to provide a year-on-year performance comparison for the newly enlarged Group.</span></p>
<p class="asa"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Non-market performance conditions for LTIPs granted in the year-ended 31 March 2021 and the six months ended 30 September 2021 have been set using pro forma results as a baseline for measuring growth over the vesting period. </span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Non-market performance conditions for unvested LTIPs granted in years prior to the year-ended 31 March 2021 have been revised to incorporate pro forma results.</span></p>
<p class="asa"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="avt"><span class="any">Six months ended 30 September 2021</span></p>
<p class="auz"><span class="any">Pro forma results for the six months ended 30 September 2021 are prepared on an adjusted basis and modified for the deferred revenue haircut acquisition accounting adjustment made on acquisition of OSIsoft, LLC.</span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="atb"><span class="aqa">Six months ended 30 September 2020</span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa">Pro forma results for the six months ended 30 September 2020 have been prepared on the basis that:</span></p>
<p class="awk"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">The financial information is the combination of the consolidated financial statements of AVEVA Group plc and OSIsoft, LLC for the six months to 30 September 2020.</span></p>
<p class="awk"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">No pro forma adjustments have been made to reflect synergies or cost savings that may be expected to occur as a result of the acquisition, nor have any adjustments been made to reflect the stand-alone costs expected.</span></p>
<p class="awk"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">There has been no trading between the two groups for either of the years presented.</span></p>
<p class="awk"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">The term loan was entered into on 1 April 2020, and interest accrued from that date.</span></p>
<p class="u"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="asa"><span class="aqa">Pro forma organic constant currency</span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">Pro forma organic constant currency results are prepared on the same basis as detailed above and additionally:</span></p>
<p class="awh"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">Results for the six months ended 30 September 2021 are translated at the comparative period exchange rates.</span></p>
<p class="awj"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">Results for disposed businesses are excluded from the current and prior year.</span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
<p class="avd"><span class="aqa">Pro forma adjusted diluted EPS</span></p>
<p class="avq"><span class="any">The pro forma adjusted diluted EPS calculation assumes:</span></p>
<p class="awl"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">Rights issue shares were issued on 1 April 2020.</span></p>
<p class="awl"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">Rights issue adjustments for unexercised share options at the date of the rights issue were made at the later of 1 April 2020 and the share option award date.</span></p>
<p class="awl"><span class="tx">·      </span><span class="aqa">No timing adjustments made for actual or potential share option awards to OSIsoft employees.</span></p>
<p class="a"><span class="aqa"> </span></p>
</td>
<td class="ty" style="width:137">
<p class="a"><span class="aqa">See section d below.</span></p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></div>

<p class="asa"><span class="amc">Responsibility Statement of the Directors</span></p>
<p class="art">in respect of the Interim Report</p>
<p class="art"> </p>
<p class="art">The Directors of the Company confirm that to the best of our knowledge:</p>
<p class="art"> </p>
<p class="awy"><span class="mw">·        </span><span class="ze">the Interim Report has been prepared in accordance with IAS 34;</span></p>
<p class="awy"><span class="mw">·        </span><span class="ze">the Interim Report includes a fair review of the information required by DTR 4.2.7R, being an indication of the important events that have occurred during the first six months of the financial year and a description of the principal risks and uncertainties for the remaining six months of the year; and</span></p>
<p class="awy"><span class="mw">·        </span><span class="ze">the Interim Report includes a fair review of the information required by DTR 4.2.8R, being disclosure of related party transactions and changes therein since the last Annual Report.</span></p>
<p class="art"> </p>
<p class="art">The Directors of the Company are consistent with those listed in the 2021 Annual Report and Accounts, except for:</p>
<p class="awy"><span class="mw">·        </span><span class="ze">the resignation of Craig Hayman with effect 7 July 2021;</span></p>
<p class="awy"><span class="mw">·        </span><span class="ze">the appointment of Hilary Maxson as a Non-Executive Director with effect 1 August 2021; and</span></p>
<p class="awy"><span class="mw">·        </span><span class="ze">the appointment of Dr Ayesha Khanna as an independent Non-Executive Director with effect 28 October 2021.</span></p>
<p class="art"> </p>
<p class="art">A list of current directors is maintained on the Company's website <a href="http://www.aveva.com" data-type="url" class="tr-link" translate="no">www.aveva.com</a>.</p>
